headline: These 2 Dow Stocks Are Set to Soar in 2025 and Beyond
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJINDICES: ^DJI) does not typically include growth stocks.  Names in this group tend to be mature and relatively slow-moving businesses.  Hence, growth stock investors shouldn't automatically write off Dow 30 stocks.
